name: Sour Cream Peach Pie
author: LESLIE VAN SLACK
summary: This recipe combines the delicious flavors of peaches with sour cream and a hint of almond extract.
ingredients: 4 cups sliced fresh or frozen peaches
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, stir together the sour cream, white sugar, 1/3 cup flour and almond extract until smooth
Sprinkle 1 tablespoon of flour over the pie crust to prevent it from getting soggy
Alternate layers of peaches and the sour cream mixture, beginning with a layer of peaches and ending with a layer of sour cream
Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven
Reduce the heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Continue baking for an additional 35 minutes
Remove the pie from the oven and sprinkle brown sugar over the top
Set the oven to Broil, and broil for 2 to 3 minutes, until caramelized
